name: villagebroken
query:
SELECT
  name, villagenameen, district, sub_district,
  LEFT(location, 120) AS loc_snippet
FROM `tabVillages`
WHERE IFNULL(location,'') <> ''
  AND (
    JSON_VALID(location) = 0
    OR JSON_EXTRACT(location,'$.type') <> 'Point'
    OR JSON_EXTRACT(location,'$.coordinates[0]') IS NULL
    OR JSON_EXTRACT(location,'$.coordinates[1]') IS NULL
    OR location REGEXP '^[[:space:]]*,[[:space:]]*$'        -- only a comma
    OR location REGEXP '^[[:space:]]*[،][[:space:]]*$'      -- Arabic comma
    OR location REGEXP '\\}[[:space:]]*\\{'                 -- two JSONs stuck together
    OR location REGEXP '^[^\\[{]'                           -- starts with non-JSON char (e.g. digits)
    OR location LIKE '%%location %%'                        -- junk word "location "
  )
LIMIT 50;
